RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND: The requested resource was not found

centerInactive.title: Center Inactive
centerInactive.description: The selected center is currently inactive and cannot be accessed. Please select a different center to continue.

profileInactive.title: Profile Inactive
profileInactive.description: Your selected profile is currently inactive and cannot be accessed. Please select a different profile to continue.

centerAccessDenied.title: Center Access Denied
centerAccessDenied.description: You do not have access to this center. Please contact your administrator to request center access.

centerAccessInactive.title: Center Access Inactive
centerAccessInactive.description: Your access to this center is currently inactive. Please contact the center administrator for more information.

resourceNotFound: The requested resource was not found
tooManyRequests: Too many requests. Please try again later
tooManyRequestsWithTime: Too many requests. Please try again in {time}
duplicateField: This {field} is already in use. Please choose a different one
foreignKeyViolation: One or more referenced items do not exist
databaseConfigurationError: A system error occurred. Please try again later
databaseOperationFailed: The operation could not be completed. Please try again
recordNotFound: The requested item could not be found
businessLogicError: The operation could not be completed due to a business rule violation
userHasNoEmail: User does not have an email address. Please use SMS or WhatsApp channel
userHasNoPhone: User does not have a phone number. Please use EMAIL channel
emailVerificationMustBeAuthenticated: Email verification must be requested through the authenticated endpoint
userAlreadyHasProfileCannotImport: User already has a profile. Cannot import without center access
targetUserMustHaveAdminOrStaffProfile: Target user must have an admin or staff profile to grant center access
refreshTokenNotFound: Refresh token not found in request body
eitherTargetUserProfileIdOrProfileTypeRe: Either targetUserProfileId or profileType must be provided
